preface.title: Preface
preface.para: Teiid offers the power of a federated relational query engine for use with any Java application - without the need for a separate server process. Accessing your federated data is as easy as making a JDBC connection to any relational data source. This guide will take you through

listitem.para: Deployment of Teiid in your environment
Building and deploying a Virtual Database(VDB)
Connecting to your VDB and issuing federated queries against your VDB and getting results back

preface.para: Commercial development support, production support, and training for Teiid is available through JBoss. Teiid is a Professional Open Source project and a critical component of the JBoss Enterprise Data Services Platform.

sect1.title: What is This Guide About?
sect1.para: This guide takes you through an introduction to the concepts important to Teiid, downloading the software, and building and deploying a demonstration virtual database in 60 minutes. There is a lot to cover, so let's begin!

note.para: Please read Federation Basics and understand different terminologies used, resources needed and artifacts that need to be generated before developing a successful application. This example takes advantage of only a minimal set of features from Teiid Embedded for the sake of simplicity and time.
